description: The epitome of the do-it-all down jacket, the Access Down Hoody is our most versatile midweight down insulator that brings the heat for primo fall days, lightweight ski tours and chilly days down in town. New for F19, the jacket’s lofty 700-fill goose down insulation packs down small in your pack or duffel, and zippered hand and chest pockets stash your phone, wallet and other small essentials.
name: Black Diamond Access Down Hoody - Mens

specs.value: 700 fill-power RDS certified goose down with DWR treatment - 85% Down, 15% Feather, Goose Down
20D nylon plain woven with DWR - 37 g
